channel.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
channel.description:
Please don't flame just give me some constructive feedback and tell me what you think I just started doing graphics and its fun ;D
[IMG]http://aycu16.webshots.com/image/27735/2002336318540307515_rs.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

OK…minus the render, I would think I just got hit by a car or something, which is why the text is all fuzzy and there is a bright light shining at my face. I won’t give you a rating, but I will say this. When I first started out with graphics, I made ALOT worse.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:3, topic:137733”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=189329.msg1709090#msg1709090 date=1188287904]
fugly, i rate 2/10, the render is ugly and the text dosent match but the sun is nice
[/quote]

How dare you, it may be fuzzy, and low res, but you shouldn’t criticize the render. The rest of the sig is different, it looks like you used some kind of lens flare or something, and then you used your name in large letters. It’s not really anything, just kind of put a picture, and made a weird background, and slapped some text on it. If I were you, I would look into some Text effect tuts, and some Render blending Tuts, also some grunge sig tuts. That’ll be the best thing you can do at this point.

I give it a 3.97/10[/quote]

the grunge tuts is your preference it doesnt mean he should start there =\ he should start with what he likes

also the render is kinda random compared to whats going on and there is no blending and the text just takes up space not sure what to say about the text =\

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:9, topic:137733”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=189329.msg1709102#msg1709102 date=1188288141]

fugly, i rate 2/10, the render is ugly and the text dosent match but the sun is nice

it may be fuzzy, and low res
[/quote]

I said it was fuzzy and low res, I didn’t say it was amazing, I still critiqued it. But Fellix was being hateful, i–own–i just got into graphics, and he’s having fun with it, why scare someone away when you can embrace them, who know i–own–i may be one of the best, given some time, and a lot of tutorials.[/quote]
meh, im tired what can i say?

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

Lol Thanks ThAt

I am just messing around with it to learn all the basics of tools and stuff yet.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 09:31:04 PM[/size][hr]Do you think this one is any better? I know the text is still gay I will find out about text effects soon I just wanna see what you think of this.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:3, topic:137733”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=189329.msg1709090#msg1709090 date=1188287904]
fugly, i rate 2/10, the render is ugly and the text dosent match but the sun is nice
[/quote]

it may be fuzzy, and low res[/quote]

I said it was fuzzy and low res, I didn’t say it was amazing, I still critiqued it. But Fellix was being hateful, i–own–i just got into graphics, and he’s having fun with it, why scare someone away when you can embrace them, who know i–own–i may be one of the best, given some time, and a lot of tutorials.

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ah, Paint Shop Pro… I thought that light source looked familiar I moved on from that a long time ago.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

Lol thanks for feedback but the funny thing is I did the whole thing from scratch on paint shop pro Never used magic wand I cut out the Duke and did it the long way cuz I don’t know a faster way Lol and just cloned it on there. And yeah I only have basic texts and I need to find out how to get more and figure out text effects.

The background is made with paint brush and I used an effect to bring brush strokes out then softened it.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yes, but when giving feedback you don’t leave out something just because it represents something that you like. If it’s bad, you point it out and tell them ways to fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Why? It’s Duke, the Java mascot. Obviously he used Duke as his Render because he likes Java, he was attempting to make a Java Fan sig, of sorts. You can criticize the render if you like, but he’s a beginner, not a master of the pen tool. So what if he used the magic wand, it was put there to be used.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)

you shouldn't criticize the render.
Why not? The render is low quality and he obviously used the magic wand on it.

item.title: Rate my banner (just started with graphics)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

fellixombc:

fugly, i rate 2/10, the render is ugly and the text dosent match but the sun is nice

How dare you, it may be fuzzy, and low res, but you shouldn’t criticize the render. The rest of the sig is different, it looks like you used some kind of lens flare or something, and then you used your name in large letters. It’s not really anything, just kind of put a picture, and made a weird background, and slapped some text on it. If I were you, I would look into some Text effect tuts, and some Render blending Tuts, also some grunge sig tuts. That’ll be the best thing you can do at this point.

I give it a 3.97/10
